translations: [化学] 异构化；异构化作用

sentences.sentence: For the process of the isomerizations, the former is endothermal reaction, the later is exothermic.
sentences.translation: 前者异构化为吸热反应，后者为放热反应。

sentences.sentence: The efficiency of the non resonant two photon (NRTP) isomerizations of stilbenes and 1,4 diphenyl 1,3 butadienes was found to depend strongly on the wavelength of the laser pulses.
sentences.translation: 实验发现，芪，1，4-二苯基1，3-丁二烯等多聚烯化合物的非共振双光子（NRTP）异构化强烈地依赖于光波长。
